Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ibis Styles Roma Eur in Rome (EUR), you'll be convenient to PalaLottomatica and Museum of Roman Civilization. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo della Civilta Italiana and Euroma2.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 191 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of ibis Styles Roma Eur. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator (lift). Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has facilities measuring 1614 square feet (150 square meters), including meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of ibis Styles Roma Eur. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at ibis Styles Roma Eur in Rome (EUR), you'll be convenient to PalaLottomatica and Museum of Roman Civilization. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo della Civilta Italiana and Euroma2.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

PalaLottomatica - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Palazzo della Civilta Italiana - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Euroma2 - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
White Gallery - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Museo Nazionale delle Arti e Tradizioni Popolari - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Museum of Roman Civilization - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Abbazia delle Tre Fontane - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
I Granai Shopping Center - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Parco de' Medici Golf Club - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Roma Tre University - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Montemartini Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Catacombs of St. Domitilla - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Fosse Ardeatine - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for ibis Styles Roma Eur is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
